statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -17 \\ -9 \\ 7 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
